page.title: 15Local news
page.content: The Radstock, Midsomer Norton and district museum society held a public meeting on Tuesday to consider the way forward. An old mining office in Radstock could house the local museum providing it is made safe. Next week Wansdyke District Council are holding a special meeting at which the Tory leader (David Wilshire) will be questioned about an alleged interest in the Hollies development in Midsomer Norton. Schoolboy Jason Self (aged 11) picked up a rust-encrusted object frp, a stream near his home and took it home. His father realized it was a World War two grenade and called the army experts who took it away for examination. Extracts from Somerset & Avon Guardian July 1985
